name: Screw Factory
description:
Unleash your handyman or handywoman!

Feel the satisfaction of tightening screws and build a wide variety of objects - Toys, Furniture, Cars, Electronics and many more.

Sell those objects for the best price and upgrade your tool arsenal.

Be careful tho, if you screw too lose your object will fall apart, too tight you'll break it - get the perfect timing and you'll earn extra money.

Incredibly "Addictive" and "Satisfying" gameplay.

Game Features:
- Easy-to-learn controls with stunning visual effects
- Upgrade your features to increase the production capacity of the factory
- Earn more for better screw machines!
- Unlock all chapters to beat your competitors from all over the world and climb the leaderboard to become #1.
publishers: BAP INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY AND IMPORT EXPORTS COMPANY
